name: The 6th World Conference on Business and Management
content: The WCBM 2024 is 6th annual international interdisciplinary conference, focusing on both theory and practice of new ideas and perspectives on interdisciplinary global business prosperity. The WCBM, which had to be suspended due to COVID-19, will be held in person for the first time in five years since 2019\. Delegates from all over the world will participate in the conference for an opportunity to hear and discuss fresh ideas about a new business paradigm, to share the latest knowledge, and to learn a view of the business of the future. The conference invites original contributions including research papers and posters on topics related to global business and management.
